abstract.p:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: substrate to provide a display device which is hardly damaged.
SOLUTION: the display device 100, and the first surface 22a in pixel section 20A and a terminal portion 20B is provided and a substrate 22, which is bonded to the terminal part 20B and a flexible printed circuit board 26, and the substrate 22 of the opposite side of the first surface 22a in pixel section 20A and a second surface 22b which is bonded in a region facing the plate 21 and, in the second surface 22b and the terminal part 20B opposed region and which is bonded to the support member 40, and a polarizing plate 21 which is bonded to the support member 40 and the cover member 10, is provided.
Selected drawing: fig. 1

technical-field.p: The present invention, a display device.

background-art.p: The display panel is curved so that the display device is known (for example, patent document 1). The display device of this kind, and which is called a curved display. The display panel, manufactured by using a thin film substrate. The display panel, the display surface is curved on a cover member for protecting the adhesive. A display panel, a cover plate, and by a curved member, the curved display is achieved.

tech-problem.p: The substrate, the cover member so as to easily follow the shape of the curved profile. However, a substrate and a thin, becomes weak mechanical strength of the substrate, the substrate is easily damaged by impact is not intended.

For example, the display panel, the pixel unit and having a terminal portion and is manufactured by using the substrate. A terminal portion is provided on the first surface of the substrate, the flexible printed circuit board (or less, and sometimes sevofluran "FPC") is electrically connected. The pixel portion and facing the second surface of the substrate, a polarizing plate. The display panel, a polarizing plate toward the cover member in a state where the cover member.

In this configuration, between the cover member and the terminal part, at least by the thickness of the polarizing plate, a gap is formed. Therefore, the polarizing plate on the outside of the thin substrate exists alone, FPC routed with stress, which can cause damage to the substrate.
The purpose of present invention, substrate to provide a display device which is hardly damaged.

tech-solution.p: The display device according to one embodiment of the present invention, the first surface and the pixel and and provided with a terminal portion, the terminal is electrically connected to the circuit board and the flexible printed circuit, the first surface of the substrate and a second surface on the opposite side of the pixel portion and bonded to the facing area and a polarizing plate, and the second surface of the terminal part in a region opposite to and bonded to the support member, and the polarizing plate bonded to the support member and a cover member, is provided.

description-of-drawings.p: The fig. 1, a first embodiment of a cross-section of the display device. The fig. 2, when the display device is configured as a curved display panel of the display and the cross section of the cover member. The fig. 3, which shows the vicinity of the terminal part of the display device. The fig. 4, is a sectional diagram of the display device of a comparative example. The fig. 5, is a sectional diagram of the display device of a comparative example. The fig. 6, a second embodiment of a cross-section of the display device.

description-of-embodiments.p: The form of the invention (embodiment) for executing per, while referring to the drawing in detail and explained. The present invention is described below by but is not limited to the embodiment. Moreover, the components described below, which can easily assume makers, being substantially the same. Furthermore, the constituent elements described below can be combined. Incidentally, in the example disclosed is not too accoprding, skilled in, keeping the gist of the invention suitable for easily changing the towel can, naturally, the range of the present invention is incorporated. Furthermore, in order to more clearly explain the drawing, compared to an actual embodiment, the width of each, thickness, shape or the like when there is represented schematically, in one example accoprding, interpretation of the present invention is not limited. Furthermore, in each figure and herein, elements already described above and similar to that of the drawing, is of the same sign, a detailed explanation is omitted as appropriate.

[The first embodiment]
The fig. 1, of a first embodiment of the present invention related to a cross-sectional diagram of the display device 100. The fig. 2, display device 100 is configured as a curved display and display panel 20 when the cross section of the cover member 10. The fig. 3, which shows a plan view of the display device 100 in the vicinity of the terminal part 20B.
As shown in fig. 1, the display device 100, and the cover member 10, and a display panel 20, FPC26 and, and IC (Integrated Circuit) chip 27, and the backlight 30, is provided.

The display panel 20, and the first polarizing plate 21, and the first substrate 22, and a second board 23, and the second polarizing plate 24, is provided. A first and a second substrate 23 and provided on the opposite substrate 22. The first substrate 22 and the second liquid crystal layer between the substrate 23 (not shown) is provided. The first polarizing plate 21, the first substrate 22 and a second board 23 is provided on a surface on the opposite side. The second polarizing plate 24, the second and the first substrate 22 of the substrate 23 are provided on the surface of the opposite side. The first substrate 22, projecting to the outside of the second substrate 23 having a projecting part 25. The terminal part 20B overhanging part 25 is provided (refer fig. 3), the IC chip 27 and FPC26 terminal part 20B are electrically connected.

As shown in figs. 1 and 3, the first surface 22a (surface of the second substrate 23 side) of the first substrate 22, and a terminal portion 20B and the pixel portion 20A is provided. The pixel portion 20A, is provided with a plurality of pixels PX in matrix form. The pixel portion 20A, terminal part 20B is provided with a plurality of external terminals (not shown) and are electrically connected. The first surface 22a and a second substrate 23 in the region opposed to the forming area of the pixel portion 20A. The first surface 22a which protrudes from the region of the second board 23 in the terminal part 20B of the forming area. FPC26 the, terminal part 20B via a conductive adhesive layer 29. The IC chip 27, by flip-chip mounting, and a terminal part 20B are electrically connected.

As shown in fig. 1, the backlight 30, and is disposed facing the display panel 20. The backlight 30, for irradiating light to the display panel 20. The display panel 20, the light irradiated from the backlight 30 forming an image by modulating. As the backlight 30, an edge light type and direct-type system can be adopted for any system.

The display surface of the display panel 20 (back light 30 side and the opposite side face) is, via an adhesive layer 19 is bonded to the cover member 10. The cover member 10, for example, of a plastic substrate or a glass substrate or a transparent substrate capable of transmitting visible light. The cover member 10, display panel 20 by the modulated light is transmitted. As shown in fig. 2, the cover member 10, having a curved portion 10a. The display panel 20, curved surface 10a in a curved state along the curved portion 10a. The cover member 10, as well as protecting the display surface of the display panel 20, display panel 20 is held in a curved shape.

A member constituting the display panel 20, curved surface 10a so as to easily follow the shape of the curved profile. For example, the first substrate 22 and the second substrate 23, a glass substrate having a thickness of each 50 Âµm -200 Î¼ m.

The first substrate 22 and a second board 23 and to reduce the thickness, the first substrate 22 and the mechanical strength of the second board 23 is weakened, the first substrate 22 by unintended impact and second substrate 23 are easily damaged. In particular, the overhanging part 25, and when pulled FPC26 FPC26 for electrically connecting the other electronic components, is easily broken.

Therefore, as shown in figs. 1 and 3, in this embodiment, the first substrate 22 than the second board 23 is arranged on the side of the cover member 10, the supporting member 40 through the overhanging part 25 is fixed on the cover member 10. The first substrate 22 of second surface 22b (first surface 22a and the opposite side face) and in a region facing in the pixel portion 20A, the first polarizing plate 21. The second surface 22b and in the region opposite to the terminal part 20B, support member 40. The cover member 10, and the first polarizing plate 21 is bonded to the support member 40. The first substrate 22, a first polarizing plate 21 through a curved portion 10a and the support member 40. The protruding part 25, and the support member 40 is supported by the cover member 10. Therefore, the mechanical strength of the projecting part 25 is increased, a projection part 25 which is hard to be damaged.

The support member 40, a second surface 22b and the conductive adhesive layer 29 bonded to the opposing region. Therefore, when FPC26 is pulled, deflection occurs in the overhanging portion 25 is restrained. Furthermore, a terminal part 20B FPC26 by impact in adhering to damage at the protruding part 25 can be suppressed. Furthermore, the support member 40, and a second surface 22b in a region facing an IC chip 27. Therefore, to suppress the damage caused by the impact of the projection part 25 is mounted on the terminal part 20B IC chip 27. The thickness of the first support member 40 and the thickness of the plate 21 are equal. Therefore, the projecting part 25, the support member 40 and between the first polarizing plate 21 based on the difference in the thickness of the deflection is hard to occur.

An optional configuration of the support member 40. The support member 40, and the first polarizing plate 21 can be provided separately, and the first polarizing plate 21 may also be integrally formed. In this embodiment, the support member 40 and the first polarizing plate 21 is integrally provided. The first polarizing plate 21, and a region opposite to and pixel section 20A, and a terminal part 20B and an opposed area, provided so as to pass through, and a terminal part 20B provided in an area facing the first polarizing plate 21 is configured as the supporting member 40.

The effect of a display device 100 described above, and the display device 101 shown in figs. 4 and 5 compared with a comparison example is explained. The figs. 4 and 5, the cross section of the display device 101. The display device 100 in a configuration and in a common display device 101, the same sign.

The display device 101, point, and the first polarizing plate 21 is formed smaller than that of the second board 23, a second board 23 is arranged in the center, and the cover member 10 side of the display device 100 is different than the first substrate 22. In the display device 101, between the overhanging portion 25 and the cover member 10, the second substrate 23 and at least a second polarizing plate 24 by the thickness of the gap is formed. For this purpose, a projection part 25 by a thin. Therefore, with stress FPC26 extending, overhanging part 25 which can cause damage.

As shown in fig. 5, FPC26 through a part of the adhesive layer 49 can be considered for fixing the cover member 10. However, the cover member 10 and to flex toward the FPC26, trying to eliminate deflection and a force is applied to the protruding part 25, the possibility of damage to a protruding part 25. FPC26 is gently deflected, this force is reduced. However, since the width W of the bent portion is increased, the size of equipment (frame) becomes difficult.

On the other hand, in the display device 100 of this embodiment, the first substrate 22 than the second board 23 is arranged on the side of the cover member 10, the supporting member 40 through the overhanging part 25 is fixed on the cover member 10. For this purpose, a projection part 25 is supported by the support member 40 and the cover member 10, the mechanical strength of the projecting part 25 is increased. Therefore, as shown in fig. 5 without devising, damage of the projection part 25 can be suppressed. Therefore, the display device is less likely to cause breakage in a narrow frame. Furthermore, the curved surface 10a of the first substrate 22 is bonded to the case, the first substrate 22 are curved along the curved section 10a must be performed, the first substrate 22 and the polarizing plate 21 is supported by the support member 40, the first substrate 22 is hardly damaged.

[Second embodiment]
The fig. 6, a second embodiment of the present invention of a cross-section of the display device 200. In this embodiment and the first embodiment regarding the common components, the same sign, a detailed explanation is omitted.

The display device 200, and the cover member 10, and the display panel 50, FPC56 and, and IC chips 57, is provided. The display panel 50, and a polarizing plate 51, and the substrate 52, is provided. The substrate 52 has a first surface 52a, and the pixel portion 50A and a terminal section 50B is provided. The pixel portion 50A, is provided with a plurality of pixels in a matrix form. Each pixel has, as a display element, the organic EL element is provided. The first surface 52a, according to need, pixel section 50A, a sealing substrate (not shown) is provided. The pixel portion 50A, terminal section 50B is provided with a plurality of external terminals (not shown) and are electrically connected. FPC56 the, terminal section 50B via a conductive adhesive layer 59. The IC chip 57, by flip-chip mounting, and is electrically connected to a terminal portion 50B.

The display surface of the display panel 50 (the first surface 52a and the opposite side of the second surface 52b) is, via an adhesive layer 19 is bonded to the cover member 10. The cover member 10, a light emitted from a pixel portion 50A of the organic EL element. As shown in fig. 2, the cover member 10, having a curved portion 10a. The display panel 50, the curved surface 10a in a curved state along the curved portion 10a. The cover member 10, as well as protecting the display surface of the display panel 50, the display panel 50 is held in a curved shape.

A member constituting the display panel 50, the curved surface 10a so as to easily follow the shape of the curved profile. For example, the substrate 52, a glass substrate having a thickness of 50 Âµm-200Î¼m.

In the area of the pixel portion 50A in a second and opposite surface 52b of the substrate 52, which is bonded to the plate 51. The second surface 52b and a terminal section 50B in the region opposing, support member 60. The cover member 10, and a polarizing plate 51 are bonded to the support member 60. The substrate 52, polarizing plate 51 through a curved portion 10a and the support member 60. The terminal section 50B is provided on a portion of the substrate 52, and the support member 60 is supported by the cover member 10. Therefore, the terminal section 50B is provided on a portion of the mechanical strength of the substrate 52, which are hardly damaged.

The support member 60, the second surface 52b of the region opposite to and conductive adhesive layer 59. Therefore, when FPC56 is pulled, terminal section 50B is provided on a portion of the substrate 52 to cause deflection can be suppressed. Furthermore, a terminal portion 50B FPC56 by impact in adhering to the damage of the substrate 52 is suppressed. Furthermore, the supporting member 60, and a second surface 52b in a region facing the IC chip 57. Consequently, IC chip 57 mounted on a terminal part 50B in the shock at the time of occurrence of breakage of the substrate 52 is suppressed. The thickness of the support member 60 and is equal to the thickness of the plate 51. Therefore, the terminal section 50B is provided on a portion of the substrate 52, a polarizing plate 51 and the thickness of the supporting member 60, based on the difference in deflection is hard to occur.

The configuration of the support member 60 is optional. The support member 60, and a polarizing plate 51 can be provided separately from, and integrally provided with a plate 51. In this embodiment, the polarizing plate 51 and the support member 60. The plate 51, and a region opposite to and pixel section 50A, and a terminal section 50B and the opposed area, provided so as to straddle, terminal portion 50B and a region opposite to a polarizing plate 51 is provided in the support member 60.
Therefore, also in this embodiment, the display device 200 is hardly damaged substrate 52.

reference-signs-list.p:
10 cover member
The curved surface 10a
20A, the pixel portion 50A
20B, 50B terminal part
21,51 polarizing plate
22,52 substrate
22a, 52a of the first surface
22b, a second surface 52b
26,56 FPC (flexible printed circuit board)
27,57 IC chip
29,59 conductive adhesive layer
40,60 support member
100,200 display device

claim.claim-text:
The first surface and a pixel portion and provided with a terminal part and,
The terminals are electrically connected to a flexible printed circuit board, and,
Polarizing plate and the first surface of the substrate and a region opposed to the pixel portion and on the opposite side of the second surface,
In the terminal part and the second surface region opposed to and bonded to the support member,
The polarizing plate and the support member and a cover member,
A display device is provided.

The polarizing plate, and the area of the pixel portion and opposed to each other, and a region opposite to the terminal part and, provided so as to straddle,
The terminal part and opposed to the polarizing plate is provided in the region of the support member are formed as
The display device of claim 1 is described.

The flexible printed circuit board, through the conductive adhesive layer and bonded to the terminal part,
The support member, the second surface of the conductive adhesive layer and bonded to the facing area
The display device of claim 1 or 2, described.

The terminal part, IC chips are electrically connected,
The support member, the IC chip and the second surface is bonded to the opposed area
1 described in any one of claim 1 to 3 of the display device.

The thickness of the support member and is equal to the thickness of the polarizing plate
1 described in any one of claim 1 to 4 of the display device.

The cover member comprises, a curved part has a curved,
The substrate, the polarizing plate and through the supporting member is bonded to the curved surface
1 described in any one of claim 1 to 5 of the display device.

The substrate, a glass substrate having a thickness of 50 Âµm-200Î¼m
1 described in any one of claim 1 to 6 of the display device.
